REASON: I feel very depressed and down. This is very much a big change for me. I am usually very happy-go-lucky. I feel like a could cry at any given point. I also have this horrible headache and I normally never get headaches. I am not sure I want to be on this medication anymore.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MEXITIL: The medication is working for the problem that I had, but I do not like the side effects that I am experiencing.

REASON: I felt terrible on this medication and I stopped taking it after 6 days due to its side effects:  nervousness, sleep disturbances, tremors and brain fog. I also started gaining about a pound of weight per day.
